content: This is already starting to look like an ugly pattern. We’ve already btdt and have the t-shirts to prove it. From Joseph McCarthy, thru today we’ve seen way too many useless witch hunts that break pocketbooks and the people attached to them. This cannot safely continue; not with this vindictive personality getting ready to take over the reins of power. Vladdy Putin wrote his playbook so that should be a wake-up call to everyone. Stay alert and informed for everyone’s safety.
